definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to come as no surprise/as expected

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, I was pretty good, having all but officially moved into the arcade.
sentences.chinese: 我几乎搬进了游戏室，所以不出意料，我玩的很棒。

sentences.english: This has created an unexpectedly profitable market for Roshan.
sentences.chinese: 这为罗山带来了出乎意料的赢利市场。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, these neurons respond to primitive rewards, such as food and water.
sentences.chinese: 不出意料，这些神经元对食物和水等原始的奖赏反应。

sentences.english: It can be easily used with freshing touch, non greasy, protect the skin with favorable moisturizing effect.
sentences.chinese: 虽为乳霜，却出人意料地易于涂抹，触感清爽不油腻。

sentences.english: The result is quite a shocker but I am not surprised.
sentences.chinese: 结果是有点出乎意料，但我却不太吃惊。

sentences.english: The Reserve Bank of Australia kept rates on hold early this morning as the market expected.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲联储今天早些时候维持利率，且在市场意料中。

sentences.english: Unexpectedly, the craft crashed when it was landing.
sentences.chinese: 出乎意料地，飞船在着陆的时候撞坏了。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, the latter contributed less to charity.
sentences.chinese: 不出意料，后者捐给慈善机构的钱少一些。

sentences.english: Unexpectedly, someone in our family was admitted to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 但出乎意料的是，家里有人生病住进了医院。

sentences.english: To their astonishment, the engineers didn't buy a ticket at all.
sentences.chinese: 而出乎他们的意料，工程师连一张票也没买。

sentences.english: And yet, according to the MRI, my libido is surprisingly strong.
sentences.chinese: 然而，根据核磁共振成像，我的性驱力出人意料的强。

sentences.english: The complexity of the project was way beyond out expection.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划的复杂性出乎我们的意料之外。

sentences.english: Dryden often surpasses expectation, and Pope never falls below it.
sentences.chinese: 德莱顿经常出人意料，而蒲柏从不令人失望。

sentences.english: A further collapse in prices could be forestalled by unexpected supply disruptions.
sentences.chinese: 意料之外的供应中断可能会阻止价格的进一步暴跌。

sentences.english: The unexpected disaster happened without my being aware of it.
sentences.chinese: 意料不到的灾难在我不知不觉中发生了。

definition: due to/to stem from/to go beyond (also fig. beyond reason, expectations etc)/to go against (expectations)
to come as no surprise/as expected
turned out other than expected (idiom); unexpected
not expected at the outset (idiom)/unforeseen/to be surprised by the turn of events
unexpected/hard to imagine/it had not occurred to me/who could have thought that
